short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plantastic Tab is a Chrome Extension for the New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension brings a touch of nature to the web browsing experience. 

The extension will update your new tab page and provide an easy access to web search provided by Microsoft Bing and provides the features below:

- Clean new tab look
- Changing  backgrounds with vast collection of stunning plant images
- Popular useful links
- Convenient web search provided by Microsoft Bing search results. With it, you can easily search for your favorite topics, images, videos, and news

This extension is free to download from the Chrome Web store, and you can uninstall it at any time.

By installing and using Plantastic Tab you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Personal Data:
Plantastic Tab will never collect any personal data, browsing history, etc. Plantastic Tab  also doesn't share/care about your data at all.

For more information please check:

Terms of Service:
https://plantastictab.com/terms

Privacy Policy:
https://plantastictab.com/privacy
